channel.title: Dialogue Help
channel.description:
[code]---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5 at DialogueHandler.loadDialogues(DialogueHandler.java:113) at DialogueHandler.<init>(DialogueHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:36)[/code]
I added a //first click npc dialgue from the dialgues in dialogues.cfg but obviously it is not working:D here is my edit in client.java
[code]else if (NPCID == 1552) // Santa { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 9005;[/code]
Here are the edits in dialgues.cfg
[code]dialogue = 9005 1 9003 Rick_James_Bitch_You_want_Santa's_Goods? EMPTY[/code]
Are there any edits I need to fix...and is there more I need to add for a dialgue...the santa is also suppose to bring up a shop which doesnt even work lol need help with that too..maybe I can add in dialoge.."After "" openup()wanneshop?"

item.title: Dialogue Help
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

sooo the scripting parts are right and that is the only places I have to edit? When you mean tabs on codes do you mean between the wannedialgue numbers?

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue Help
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

You didn’t space out the code in dialogues.cfg enough

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue Help
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5 at DialogueHandler.loadDialogues(DialogueHandler.java:113) at DialogueHandler.<init>(DialogueHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:36)

I added a //first click npc dialgue from the dialgues in dialogues.cfg but obviously it is not working:D here is my edit in client.java

else if (NPCID == 1552) // Santa { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 9005;

Here are the edits in dialgues.cfg

dialogue = 9005	1	9003	Rick_James_Bitch_You_want_Santa's_Goods?	EMPTY

Are there any edits I need to fix…and is there more I need to add for a dialgue…the santa is also suppose to bring up a shop which doesnt even work lol need help with that too…maybe I can add in dialoge…“After “” openup()wanneshop?”

Read full topic
